normalized: i dash towards faust.

normalized: daamn iit!

name: faust
normalized: muaah!?

i didn't feel any pain despite having slammed my fistinto a body made of steel.

name: faust
normalized: g-guh…

somethingyuko-sensei's or lily's magic didn't seem to do.

this is my body!

that body is faust-sama's――

now that i've already experienced how this incredibleacceleration feels like, it isn't nearly as perplexing.

name: faust
normalized: did you forget, young man!

normalized: guh!?

name: ichiro

move!

name: ichiro
normalized: guaah!

i don't manage to even twitch.

name: faust

i havebeen telling you it's pointless.

first, i'll finishoff your women.

normalized: guh… hold iit!

name: faust
normalized: hold it!?

normalized: ooh!

name: faust
normalized: w-what…!?

his face is completely bewildered.

name: faust
normalized: what is happening…!?

name: ichiro
normalized: g-guuh!

name: faust
normalized: i-it can't be!?

i'm slowlyregaining my body's freedom, like i was breakingthe invisible restraining chains.

name: ichiro
normalized: i will fight!

and i willsave yuko-sensei and lily!
my very own wish ―― i'll protect the two of them.
evenif i have to sacrifice myself, i will fight!
the moment i say my strong feelings out loud, a dazzlinglight quickly fills the room.

name: faust
normalized: w-what is this!?

name: ichiro
normalized: t-this is…
the light is coming from the 『leontopodium alpinum』brooch i always carry with me.

name: ichiro
normalized: grandma…
for a moment, i think i saw my grandmother smilinggently in the dazzling light.

name: ichiro
normalized: uuaah!?
everything is… flowing into me…
various words and experiences flow into me, as if a penwas writing them into my brain like you would into anotebook.
all the knowledge accumulated over a long time flowsinto my body and becomes mine.
the room comes to a standstill once all of the light hasbeen absorbed into my body.

name: ichiro
normalized: haah… i…
i look at my hand after regaining my body's freedom.

name: ichiro
normalized: it's… my own, normal hand…
not the hand of a demon, nor the hand of a perfected body.
my own hand.

name: faust
normalized: w-what is the meaning of this!?
what is…!?
whathappened!?

compared to the rambling faust, i was surprisingly calm.
with my now human hand, i fumble around in my pocket.

normalized: （as i thought…）

what my grandmother hoped… and just how much she wasworried about me and yuko-sensei…

to you, who doesn't eventry to understand people's feelings.

now that all the memories have flowed into me――

the memento my grandmother leftfor me contained a magic spell.
love towards the grandchild and daughter she had toleave behind.
her hidden testament, should evil powers ever try toget a hold of the "magician's talent" sleeping insideof me.
should that time come, in order to awaken my magician'spowers――
the charm was set to activate should i seek for powerfor someone other than myself.
should my emotions staypure even during a predicament.
my grandmother left the memento behind so that iwouldn't drown myself in a magician's great powers.
and now, i didn't want power myself, but for lily, yuko-sensei and for all of those who fell victim to faust'swicked experiments.

for the sake of defeating the monster who has beendragging his malice all the way from the middle agesinto our present day.

name: faust
normalized: ooh!?
